name: PGDisplayDescriptor
desc: A descriptor for a virtual display.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The display’s name as seen in the guest operating environment.

items.name: var sizeInMillimeters: NSSize
items.desc: The size in millimeters of the virtual display.

items.name: var queue: DispatchQueue?
items.desc: The queue that the framework uses when dispatching messages to any of the display’s registered handlers.

items.name: var cursorGlyphHandler: PGDisplayCursorGlyphHandler?
items.desc: A handler that the framework calls to change the cursor’s appearance.

items.name: var cursorShowHandler: PGDisplayCursorShowHandler?
items.desc: A handler that the framework calls to change the cursor’s visibility.

items.name: typealias PGDisplayCursorGlyphHandler
items.desc: The block signature for a routine that handles changes to the cursor’s appearance.

items.name: typealias PGDisplayCursorShowHandler
items.desc: The block signature for a routine that handles changes to the cursor’s visibility.

items.name: var modeChangeHandler: PGDisplayModeChangeHandler?
items.desc: A handler that the framework calls to change the virtual display’s graphics mode.

items.name: typealias PGDisplayModeChangeHandler
items.desc: The block signature for a routine that handles changes to the display’s graphics mode.

items.name: var newFrameEventHandler: PGDisplayNewFrameEventHandler?
items.desc: A handler that the framework calls when the guest environment has a new frame to display.

items.name: typealias PGDisplayNewFrameEventHandler
items.desc: The block signature for a routine that handles frame updates from the guest.
